channel.title: Posts on A Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Notebook

item.title: How to Upload New Entry
item.description: a memo. on RStudio’s Console new_post("title") write new posts serve_site() build_sites() Next, move on to Terminal git add . git commit -am "any comment" git push -u origin master enjoy!

item.title: 痛みのOPQRST
item.description: 概要 #knitr_options() library(tidyverse) ## ─ Attaching packages ─────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ─ ## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.8.0 ✔ stringr 1.3.0 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.3.0 ## ─ Conflicts ─────────
